title: Update branding to ProSellers across the entire landing page

requirements.summary: Replace all instances of the consultant brand name with 'ProSellers' across the entire landing page while preserving the personal name 'Mayur Sahu'
acceptanceCriteria: The Navigation bar logo/brand text displays 'ProSellers'
The Footer reads 'ProSellers — Amazon Growth Consultant'
The HTML <title> tag in index.html reads 'ProSellers | Amazon Growth Consultant' or similar
No stray references to the old brand name remain in any visible UI text
The personal name 'Mayur Sahu' is preserved unchanged in the About/Founder section and credential lines

file_operations.description: Update the HTML <title> tag to read 'ProSellers | Amazon Growth Consultant' and update any meta tags that reference the brand name
Update the logo/brand text in the navigation bar to display 'ProSellers' instead of 'Mayur Sahu' or any previous brand name
Update the footer text to read 'ProSellers — Amazon Growth Consultant' while preserving any other footer elements and attribution links

Review and update any brand name references in the hero section (headings, subheadings, or taglines) to use 'ProSellers' while keeping 'Mayur Sahu' unchanged where it appears as the founder's personal name
Review the About section to ensure 'Mayur Sahu' personal name remains unchanged in the founder profile and credentials, while updating any standalone brand/company name references to 'ProSellers'
Review and update any brand name references in form labels, headings, or call-to-action text to use 'ProSellers' while preserving personal name references

Review testimonial section headings or introductory text for brand name references and update to 'ProSellers' if present, while keeping 'Mayur Sahu' unchanged in testimonial content where it refers to the person
